00049 -(BOOL) CreateZipFile2:(NSString*) zipFile
00050 {
00051         _zipFile = zipOpen( (const char*)[zipFile UTF8String], 0 );
00052         if( !_zipFile ) 
00053                 return NO;
00054         return YES;
00055 }

00063 -(BOOL) addFileToZip:(NSString*) file newname:(NSString*) newname;
00064 {
00065         if( !_zipFile )
00066                 return NO;
00067         //      tm_zip filetime;
00068         time_t current;
00069         time( &current );
00070         
00071         zip_fileinfo zipInfo = {0};
00072         //      zipInfo.dosDate = (unsigned long) current;
00073         
00074         NSDictionary* attr = [[NSFileManager defaultManager] fileAttributesAtPath:file traverseLink:YES];
00075         if( attr )
00076         {
00077                 NSDate* fileDate = (NSDate*)[attr objectForKey:NSFileModificationDate];
00078                 if( fileDate )
00079                 {
00080                         // some application does use dosDate, but tmz_date instead
00081                         //      zipInfo.dosDate = [fileDate timeIntervalSinceDate:[self Date1980] ];
00082                         NSCalendar* currCalendar = [NSCalendar currentCalendar];
00083                         uint flags = NSYearCalendarUnit | NSMonthCalendarUnit | NSDayCalendarUnit | 
00084                         NSHourCalendarUnit | NSMinuteCalendarUnit | NSSecondCalendarUnit ;
00085                         NSDateComponents* dc = [currCalendar components:flags fromDate:fileDate];
00086                         zipInfo.tmz_date.tm_sec = [dc second];
00087                         zipInfo.tmz_date.tm_min = [dc minute];
00088                         zipInfo.tmz_date.tm_hour = [dc hour];
00089                         zipInfo.tmz_date.tm_mday = [dc day];
00090                         zipInfo.tmz_date.tm_mon = [dc month] - 1;
00091                         zipInfo.tmz_date.tm_year = [dc year];
00092                 }
00093         }
00094         
00095         int ret ;
00096         NSData* data = nil;
00097         if( [_password length] == 0 )
00098         {
00099                 ret = zipOpenNewFileInZip( _zipFile,
00100                                                                   (const char*) [newname UTF8String],
00101                                                                   &zipInfo,
00102                                                                   NULL,0,
00103                                                                   NULL,0,
00104                                                                   NULL,//comment
00105                                                                   Z_DEFLATED,
00106                                                                   Z_DEFAULT_COMPRESSION );
00107         }
00108         else
00109         {
00110                 data = [ NSData dataWithContentsOfFile:file];
00111                 uLong crcValue = crc32( 0L,NULL, 0L );
00112                 crcValue = crc32( crcValue, (const Bytef*)[data bytes], [data length] );
00113                 ret = zipOpenNewFileInZip3( _zipFile,
00114                                                                    (const char*) [newname UTF8String],
00115                                                                    &zipInfo,
00116                                                                    NULL,0,
00117                                                                    NULL,0,
00118                                                                    NULL,//comment
00119                                                                    Z_DEFLATED,
00120                                                                    Z_DEFAULT_COMPRESSION,
00121                                                                    0,
00122                                                                    15,
00123                                                                    8,
00124                                                                    Z_DEFAULT_STRATEGY,
00125                                                                    [_password cStringUsingEncoding:NSASCIIStringEncoding],
00126                                                                    crcValue );
00127         }
00128         if( ret!=Z_OK )
00129         {
00130                 return NO;
00131         }
00132         if( data==nil )
00133         {
00134                 data = [ NSData dataWithContentsOfFile:file];
00135         }
00136         unsigned int dataLen = [data length];
00137         ret = zipWriteInFileInZip( _zipFile, (const void*)[data bytes], dataLen);
00138         if( ret!=Z_OK )
00139         {
00140                 return NO;
00141         }
00142         ret = zipCloseFileInZip( _zipFile );
00143         if( ret!=Z_OK )
00144                 return NO;
00145         return YES;
00146 }

00148 -(BOOL) CloseZipFile2
00149 {
00150         _password = nil;
00151         if( _zipFile==NULL )
00152                 return NO;
00153         BOOL ret =  zipClose( _zipFile,NULL )==Z_OK?YES:NO;
00154         _zipFile = NULL;
00155         return ret;
00156 }

00158 -(BOOL) UnzipOpenFile:(NSString*) zipFile
00159 {
00160         _unzFile = unzOpen( (const char*)[zipFile UTF8String] );
00161         if( _unzFile )
00162         {
00163                 unz_global_info  globalInfo = {0};
00164                 if( unzGetGlobalInfo(_unzFile, &globalInfo )==UNZ_OK )
00165                 {
00166                         NSLog([NSString stringWithFormat:@"%d entries in the zip file",globalInfo.number_entry] );
00167                 }
00168         }
00169         return _unzFile!=NULL;
00170 }

00178 -(BOOL) UnzipFileTo:(NSString*) path overWrite:(BOOL) overwrite
00179 {
00180         BOOL success = YES;
00181         int ret = unzGoToFirstFile( _unzFile );
00182         unsigned char           buffer[4096] = {0};
00183         NSFileManager* fman = [NSFileManager defaultManager];
00184         if( ret!=UNZ_OK )
00185         {
00186                 [self OutputErrorMessage:@"Failed"];
00187         }
00188         
00189         do{
00190                 if( [_password length]==0 )
00191                         ret = unzOpenCurrentFile( _unzFile );
00192                 else
00193                         ret = unzOpenCurrentFilePassword( _unzFile, [_password cStringUsingEncoding:NSASCIIStringEncoding] );
00194                 if( ret!=UNZ_OK )
00195                 {
00196                         [self OutputErrorMessage:@"Error occurs"];
00197                         success = NO;
00198                         break;
00199                 }
00200                 // reading data and write to file
00201                 int read ;
00202                 unz_file_info   fileInfo ={0};
00203                 ret = unzGetCurrentFileInfo(_unzFile, &fileInfo, NULL, 0, NULL, 0, NULL, 0);
00204                 if( ret!=UNZ_OK )
00205                 {
00206                         [self OutputErrorMessage:@"Error occurs while getting file info"];
00207                         success = NO;
00208                         unzCloseCurrentFile( _unzFile );
00209                         break;
00210                 }
00211                 char* filename = (char*) malloc( fileInfo.size_filename +1 );
00212                 unzGetCurrentFileInfo(_unzFile, &fileInfo, filename, fileInfo.size_filename + 1, NULL, 0, NULL, 0);
00213                 filename[fileInfo.size_filename] = '\0';
00214                 
00215                 // check if it contains directory
00216                 NSString * strPath = [NSString  stringWithCString:filename];
00217                 BOOL isDirectory = NO;
00218                 if( filename[fileInfo.size_filename-1]=='/' || filename[fileInfo.size_filename-1]=='\\')
00219                         isDirectory = YES;
00220                 free( filename );
00221                 if( [strPath rangeOfCharacterFromSet:[NSCharacterSet characterSetWithCharactersInString:@"/\\"]].location!=NSNotFound )
00222                 {// contains a path
00223                         strPath = [strPath stringByReplacingOccurrencesOfString:@"\\" withString:@"/"];
00224                 }
00225                 NSString* fullPath = [path stringByAppendingPathComponent:strPath];
00226                 
00227                 if( isDirectory )
00228                         [fman createDirectoryAtPath:fullPath withIntermediateDirectories:YES attributes:nil error:nil];
00229                 else
00230                         [fman createDirectoryAtPath:[fullPath stringByDeletingLastPathComponent] withIntermediateDirectories:YES attributes:nil error:nil];
00231                 if( [fman fileExistsAtPath:fullPath] && !isDirectory && !overwrite )
00232                 {
00233                         if( ![self OverWrite:fullPath] )
00234                         {
00235                                 unzCloseCurrentFile( _unzFile );
00236                                 ret = unzGoToNextFile( _unzFile );
00237                                 continue;
00238                         }
00239                 }
00240                 FILE* fp = fopen( (const char*)[fullPath UTF8String], "wb");
00241                 while( fp )
00242                 {
00243                         read=unzReadCurrentFile(_unzFile, buffer, 4096);
00244                         if( read > 0 )
00245                         {
00246                                 fwrite(buffer, read, 1, fp );
00247                         }
00248                         else if( read<0 )
00249                         {
00250                                 [self OutputErrorMessage:@"Failed to reading zip file"];
00251                                 break;
00252                         }
00253                         else 
00254                                 break;                          
00255                 }
00256                 if( fp )
00257                 {
00258                         fclose( fp );
00259                         // set the orignal datetime property
00260                         NSDate* orgDate = nil;
00261                         
00262                         //{{ thanks to brad.eaton for the solution
00263                         NSDateComponents *dc = [[NSDateComponents alloc] init];
00264                         
00265                         dc.second = fileInfo.tmu_date.tm_sec;
00266                         dc.minute = fileInfo.tmu_date.tm_min;
00267                         dc.hour = fileInfo.tmu_date.tm_hour;
00268                         dc.day = fileInfo.tmu_date.tm_mday;
00269                         dc.month = fileInfo.tmu_date.tm_mon+1;
00270                         dc.year = fileInfo.tmu_date.tm_year;
00271                         
00272                         NSCalendar *gregorian = [[NSCalendar alloc] 
00273                                                                          initWithCalendarIdentifier:NSGregorianCalendar];
00274                         
00275                         orgDate = [gregorian dateFromComponents:dc] ;
00276                         [dc release];
00277                         [gregorian release];
00278                         //}}
00279                         
00280                         
00281                         NSDictionary* attr = [NSDictionary dictionaryWithObject:orgDate forKey:NSFileModificationDate]; //[[NSFileManager defaultManager] fileAttributesAtPath:fullPath traverseLink:YES];
00282                         if( attr )
00283                         {
00284                                 //              [attr  setValue:orgDate forKey:NSFileCreationDate];
00285                                 if( ![[NSFileManager defaultManager] setAttributes:attr ofItemAtPath:fullPath error:nil] )
00286                                 {
00287                                         // cann't set attributes 
00288                                         NSLog(@"Failed to set attributes");
00289                                 }
00290                                 
00291                         }
00292                         
00293                         
00294                         
00295                 }
00296                 unzCloseCurrentFile( _unzFile );
00297                 ret = unzGoToNextFile( _unzFile );
00298         }while( ret==UNZ_OK && UNZ_OK!=UNZ_END_OF_LIST_OF_FILE );
00299         return success;
00300 }

00302 -(BOOL) UnzipCloseFile
00303 {
00304         _password = nil;
00305         if( _unzFile )
00306                 return unzClose( _unzFile )==UNZ_OK;
00307         return YES;
00308 }

00310 #pragma mark wrapper for delegate
00311 -(void) OutputErrorMessage:(NSString*) msg
00312 {
00313         if( _delegate && [_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(ErrorMessage)] )
00314                 [_delegate ErrorMessage:msg];
00315 }
00316 
00317 -(BOOL) OverWrite:(NSString*) file
00318 {
00319         if( _delegate && [_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(OverWriteOperation)] )
00320                 return [_delegate OverWriteOperation:file];
00321         return YES;
00322 }

00324 #pragma mark get NSDate object for 1980-01-01
00325 -(NSDate*) Date1980
00326 {
00327         NSDateComponents *comps = [[NSDateComponents alloc] init];
00328         [comps setDay:1];
00329         [comps setMonth:1];
00330         [comps setYear:1980];
00331         NSCalendar *gregorian = [[NSCalendar alloc]
00332                                                          initWithCalendarIdentifier:NSGregorianCalendar];
00333         NSDate *date = [gregorian dateFromComponents:comps];
00334         
00335         [comps release];
00336         [gregorian release];
00337         return date;
00338 }
